This document will upload, clean, and save COVID data for Washington DC.

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
```

Import data
```{r}
DC_covid <- read_csv("raw_data/raw_DC_COVID-19_Cases_by_Ward.csv") 
```
Clean variable names
```{r}
DC_covid <- clean_names(DC_covid)
```

Fixing the date and variable types
```{r}
DC_covid <- DC_covid %>%
  mutate(ward = as_factor(ward),
        report_date = ymd_hms(report_date)) %>%
  rename("date" = "report_date")
```

Saving 
```{r}
write_csv(DC_covid, file = "./dc_covid_clean.csv")
```
